name: Alarm Beacon
description: A signal tower for emergency alerts; adventurers might trigger false alarms, use it to signal allies, or investigate what threat prompted its activation.
atmosphere: The tower stands tall and imposing, with a clear view of the surrounding area. The air is crisp and clean at this height, carrying the sound of wind through the signal flags and bells. Guards maintain a constant vigil, their eyes scanning the horizon for any sign of trouble.
